entries.name: []( index, name=nil)
entries.desc: Fetches a child element.  Filters only Element children, regardless of the XPath match.

entries.name: []=( index, element )
entries.desc: Sets an element, replacing any previous matching element.  If no existing element is found ,the element is added.

entries.name: delete_all( xpath )
entries.desc: Removes multiple elements.  Filters for Element children, regardless of XPath matching.

entries.name: each( xpath=nil )
entries.desc: Iterates through all of the child Elements, optionally filtering them by a given XPath

entries.name: empty?()
entries.desc: Returns true if there are no Element children, false otherwise

entries.name: index(element)
entries.desc: Returns the index of the supplied child (starting at 1), or -1 if the element is not a child

entries.name: size()
entries.desc: Returns the number of Element children of the parent object.

entries.name: to_a( xpath=nil )
entries.desc: Returns an Array of Element children.  An XPath may be supplied to filter the children.  Only Element children are returned, even if the supplied XPath matches non-Element children.
